snippet.title: NES Game: Vs. Pinball (1984 Nintendo)
snippet.description:
A pinball game where you control the paddles of a virtual pinball machine representing a traditional pinball game.  This game also features a bonus stage with Mario carrying  the platform in attempt to rescue Pauline (who was also in the first Donkey Kong arcade game). When the blocks are all gone, she will fall, catching her on platform will earn bonus points. Her falling on the ground you will lose bonus points.

An arcade pinball game running on Nintendo's Vs arcade system which was released in 1984 a year after the NES version. This game has many differences from the NES version such as music in the game.

Note: Since this was played on an NES emulator, I'm marking it as an NES game.
